com.example.delaneyt.trafficcountapp

Class MySQLiteHelperUserTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.delaneyt.trafficcountapp.MySQLiteHelperUserTable

  • public class MySQLiteHelperUserTable
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class to handle all of the functions to do with a SQLiteDatabase table

    This class creates the User_Table within the Traffic_Surveys database. It upgrades the table if necessary. It adds traffic count data to a SQLite Database table. It also allows the user to get the data for viewing

    References: The origins of the code used in this class is accredited to ProgrammingKnowledge ref: Android SQLite Database Tutorial

    Since:
    2016-04-20
    See Also:
    "Android SQLite Database Tutorial" by ProgrammingKnowledge at:,

        Method which upgrades a table in a database
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        myUserTable - is the name of the SQLiteDatabase table
        oldVersion - is the int value of the previous version created
        newVersion - is the int value of the new version to created No return
